_sText:
Latest of the WMD series of maps.
Once again its another quick little Gun Game map that I've whipped up to play on our gun game servers, inside the file is also the txt file for GG DM spawnpoints for servers running that version of the mod, it will work in both normal gungame and DM.
This map can be run at hightest graphics settings and still be smooth on most average gaming computers. At low they will simply be phenominal but lack the nice look of the map obvisially. Radar and custom textures are included within the bsp as well to keep everything clean. Nav file is also included for convience.
For those who have been watching for the past week you now have the chance to play it.
Its currently on two of our servers: 69.65.14.206:27015 Weapons of Mass Destruction - GunGame Deathmatch 205.234.203.141:27015 Weapons of Mass Destruction - GunGame Turbo (HLStatsX) So pop in and play both styles of the game, each has its quirks :P
Also, since I don't have any real immediate projects on the go I can accept Gun Game map requests/ideas via Half Life Storm studios. Lost,
